NAME: Disarm
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical damage to an enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Shadow Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical dark damage to an enemy. Does not skip your turn.

NAME: Sharpen Knives
DESCRIPTION: Spend half your mana to sharpen your knives, raising your attack, critical hit chance and critical damage. However, lowers your physical defense. Does not skip your turn.

NAME: Hurricane Blades
DESCRIPTION: Deal moderate physical wind damage to an enemy
